## Summary

A clear and concise description of the question or research request

## Expected Outcome

Explain the most ideal approach of the question being answered, such as markdown reply in issue, attached PDF report, etc

## Constraints

What limitations, restrictions, or policies should the collaborator consider when attempting to answer this question?
